items.title: 新款MacBook Pro即将量产，但四大升级预计明年到来 (原标题: New MacBook Pro Nears Mass Production, But Four Bigger Upgrades Expected Next Year)
items.creator: Joe Rossignol
items.summary:
# 新款MacBook Pro即将量产，四大升级预计明年到来

根据彭博社的Mark Gurman最新消息，苹果下一代MacBook Pro机型即将进入大规模生产。

## 发布时间与芯片升级
*   **发布窗口**：Gurman预计新款MacBook Pro将在2025年末至2026年第一季度之间发布，最迟可在3月前订购。这与苹果供应链分析师Ming-Chi Kuo此前的预测一致，也符合苹果在2023年1月发布M2 Pro和M2 Max芯片MacBook Pro的先例。
*   **芯片**：即将推出的14英寸和16英寸MacBook Pro预计将搭载M5/M5 Pro/M5 Max芯片。
*   **其他变化**：目前尚未有关于这些即将发布的机型的其他重大变化的传闻。

## 2026年末的重大升级
预计在2026年末，MacBook Pro将迎来四项更大的升级，包括：
*   **OLED显示屏**：带来更高的对比度。
*   **触控屏**：MacBook Pro将首次支持触控功能。
*   **更薄的设计**：机身将变得更加纤薄。
*   **M6系列芯片**：搭载采用台积电最新2纳米工艺制造的M6/M6 Pro/M6 Max芯片。

## 其他潜在改进
*   **蜂窝网络连接**：有传闻称苹果可能会为Mac添加蜂窝网络连接功能。因此，配备OLED显示屏的MacBook Pro机型可能会搭载类似于iPhone 16e中的C1芯片或iPhone Air中的C1X芯片的定制设计调制解调器。
*   **刘海缩小**：OLED机型上的前置摄像头“刘海”可能会变得更小。

![Apple MacBook Pro M4 hero](https://images.macrumors.com/t/vmu3RcJ2zXzRTUhya6-707NJq04=/400x0/article-new/2024/10/Apple-MacBook-Pro-M4-hero.jpg?lossy)
![MacRumors x Bloomberg Banner Cool](https://images.macrumors.com/t/1af4XiY5l7MKT5h6GgPqIg0XEhQ=/400x0/article-new/2025/06/MacRumors-x-Bloomberg-Banner-Cool.jpg?lossy)
items.shortSummary: 新款MacBook Pro机型即将量产，预计在2025年末至2026年第一季度发布，将搭载M5系列芯片，但无其他重大变化。真正的四大升级预计在2026年末到来，包括OLED触控屏、更薄设计以及采用2纳米工艺的M6系列芯片。此外，还可能增加蜂窝网络连接和更小的刘海。
items.translated_title: 新款MacBook Pro即将量产，但四大升级预计明年到来
items.content:
Apple's next MacBook Pro models will enter mass production soon, according to the latest information shared by Bloomberg's Mark Gurman.


In his Power On newsletter today, Gurman said he continues to believe the new MacBook Pro models will be released at some point between late 2025 and the first quarter of 2026, meaning they should be available to order by March at the latest.

Apple often releases new Macs in October, but both Gurman and Apple supply chain analyst Ming-Chi Kuo previously said the next MacBook Pro models might not arrive until early 2026. Apple announced the MacBook Pro models with M2 Pro and M2 Max chips in January 2023, so there is precedent for such a timeframe.

The next 14-inch and 16-inch MacBook Pro are expected to be powered by M5/M5 Pro/M5 Max chips, but no other major changes have been rumored so far.

In late 2026, the MacBook Pro is expected to receive four bigger upgrades, including an OLED display for improved contrast ratio, a touch screen, a thinner design, and M6/M6 Pro/M6 Max chips fabricated with TSMC's latest 2nm process.

It has also been rumored that Apple might add cellular connectivity to Macs, so perhaps the MacBook Pro models with an OLED display will be equipped with a similar custom-designed modem as the C1 chip in the iPhone 16e or C1X chip in the iPhone Air. Plus, the notch surrounding the front camera might get smaller on the OLED models.

items.title: 苹果继续准备iOS 26.0.1，预计将包含多项错误修复 (原标题: Apple Continues to Prepare iOS 26.0.1 With Multiple Bug Fixes Expected)
items.creator: Joe Rossignol
items.summary:
## 苹果准备发布iOS 26.0.1，预计将包含多项错误修复

苹果公司正在积极准备发布iOS 26.0.1版本更新。这一消息最初来源于X上一个在分享未来iOS版本信息方面有良好记录的私人账户，并且MacRumors最近在其访问日志中也发现了iOS 26.0.1的内部测试证据，表明苹果的软件工程师正在内部测试此更新。

![iOS 26](https://images.macrumors.com/t/V739eP42yq6TtFd07tzOfbtmHbs=/400x0/article-new/2025/09/iOS-26.0.1-Feature.jpg?lossy)

### 版本号变化

该私人账户最初表示iOS 26.0.1的构建版本号为23A350，但现在预计更新的构建版本号将是23A355。这一变化暗示此次软件更新将包含比最初计划更多的错误修复或改动。

### 预计修复的软件错误和问题

iOS 26.0.1预计将解决以下一系列软件错误和问题：

*   **摄像头相关错误**：影响iPhone Air和iPhone 17 Pro设备。
*   **Wi-Fi连接问题**：导致iPhone Air、iPhone 17、iPhone 17 Pro和iPhone 17 Pro Max上的Wi-Fi短暂断开并重新连接，此问题还会导致车载无线CarPlay断开连接。
*   **日历应用搜索故障**：部分用户在日历应用中搜索功能失效。
*   **Apple Intelligence模型下载问题**：部分用户无法在iPhone Air、iPhone 17、iPhone 17 Pro和iPhone 17 Pro Max上下载Apple Intelligence模型。

### 发布时间和与iOS 26.1的关系

iOS 26.0.1预计将在未来几天内发布。值得注意的是，iOS 26.1目前已处于Beta测试阶段，该版本预计将包含与iOS 26.0.1相同的错误修复。此外，iOS 26.1还将为兼容的AirPods带来更多语言的Apple Intelligence和实时翻译功能，并在Apple Music、日历、照片和Safari等应用中包含一些其他次要更改。
items.shortSummary: 苹果正准备发布iOS 26.0.1更新，预计将在未来几天内推出。此次更新主要针对iPhone Air和iPhone 17系列设备上的多个软件错误进行修复，包括摄像头问题、Wi-Fi断连、日历搜索故障以及Apple Intelligence模型下载受阻等。版本号的调整表明修复内容可能比最初计划的更多。同时，正在测试中的iOS 26.1也将包含这些修复，并为Apple Intelligence和实时翻译带来更多语言支持。
items.translated_title: 苹果继续准备iOS 26.0.1，预计将包含多项错误修复
items.content:
Apple is preparing to release iOS 26.0.1, according to a private account on X with a proven track record of sharing information about future iOS versions.


The account initially said iOS 26.0.1 would have a build number of 23A350, but they now expect the update to have a build number of 23A355. This suggests that the software update will include more bug fixes or changes than initially planned.

MacRumors has also seen evidence of iOS 26.0.1 in its visitor logs in recent days, as Apple's software engineers test the update internally.

iOS 26.0.1 will likely address a handful of software bugs and issues:
  • A camera-related bug on the iPhone Air and iPhone 17 Pro

  • A bug causing Wi-Fi to briefly disconnect and reconnect on the iPhone Air, iPhone 17, iPhone 17 Pro, and iPhone 17 Pro Max — this issue also causes wireless CarPlay to disconnect in vehicles

  • A bug breaking search in the Calendar app for some users

  • A bug preventing some users from downloading Apple Intelligence models on the iPhone Air, iPhone 17, iPhone 17 Pro, and iPhone 17 Pro Max
iOS 26.0.1 will likely be released in the next few days.

iOS 26.1 is already in beta testing, and that version should include the same bug fixes that come with iOS 26.0.1. So far, iOS 26.1 makes both Apple Intelligence and Live Translation on compatible AirPods available in additional languages, and it includes some other minor changes across Apple Music, Calendar, Photos, and Safari.

items.title: 头条新闻：iOS 26.1 Beta、iPhone 划痕、Apple TV 传闻等 (原标题: Top Stories: iOS 26.1 Beta, iPhone Scratches, Apple TV Rumors, and More)
items.creator: MacRumors Staff
items.summary:
# Apple 最新动态概览

随着 iPhone 发布月的临近尾声，Apple 世界依然充满热点，包括新硬件和软件的持续发现。Apple 正在为 iOS 26.1 及其他更新准备调整和新增功能，同时预计年底前还将推出其他硬件更新。此外，Apple 的年度返校促销活动也即将结束。

![头条新闻](https://images.macrumors.com/t/_5srHqnekLPoEuz1F3xALo5K6UE=/400x0/article-new/2025/09/top-stories-2025-09-27.jpg?lossy)

## iOS 26.1 Beta 1 更新亮点

Apple 已向开发者和公共测试人员发布了 iOS 26.1 的首个 Beta 版本及相关更新，这是 iOS 26 的首次重大更新。

*   **功能扩展：** Apple Intelligence 和 AirPods 实时翻译功能扩展到更多语言。
*   **界面改进：** 电话应用中的拨号盘引入了全新的“Liquid Design”，Safari、日历及其他应用也进行了视觉调整。

![iOS 26](https://images.macrumors.com/t/kNmJGc1WKHpbB_a28crv3zDlfQI=/400x0/article-new/2025/09/iOS-26.1-Feature.jpg?lossy)

## iPhone 17 Pro 和 iPhone Air 易刮擦问题

部分在 Apple Store 展示的 iPhone 17 Pro 和 iPhone Air 新机型，尤其是在深蓝色（iPhone 17 Pro 和 Pro Max）和深空黑（iPhone Air）等深色表面上，出现了划痕和磨损。

*   **Apple 的解释：** Apple 将这些瑕疵归咎于店内使用的磨损的 MagSafe 充电器，并声称这些痕迹可以通过清洁去除。
*   **磨损承认：** Apple 也承认，像摄像头凸起边缘等特定区域可能会随着时间的推移和正常使用而出现轻微磨损。

![iPhone 17 Pro 和 Air 特性](https://images.macrumors.com/t/vtcZQQTE0ayD12yqffdGRlZFTTU=/400x0/article-new/2025/09/iPhone-17-Pro-and-Air-Feature.jpg?lossy)

## iPhone 16 Pro Max 80% 充电限制一年回顾

多年来，Apple 允许 iPhone 用户设置自定义充电限制（80%、85%、90% 或 95%），以延长电池健康。

*   **实验结果：** 一项为期一年的实验对一台设置为 80% 充电限制的 iPhone 16 Pro Max 与另一台无限制使用的设备进行了电池健康对比。文章鼓励读者查看实验结果，以决定是否调整自己的充电习惯。

![iOS 26 电池玻璃特性](https://images.macrumors.com/t/-JZORKwHAdcMCqdYe0baLXzX6TQ=/400x0/article-new/2025/08/iOS-26-Battery-Glass-Feature.jpg?lossy)

## 下一代 Apple TV 传闻

Apple TV 是预计在今年年底前获得硬件更新的产品之一。

*   **新功能预测：** 继本月早些时候 iPhone 及其他发布会之后，关于下一代 Apple 机顶盒可能带来的新功能传闻被重新整理和总结，包括可能搭载 N1 芯片和支持 Wi-Fi 7。

![Apple TV 2025 缩略图 2](https://images.macrumors.com/t/kou4oQMXYLNfbkRRQ6MlUwAtt9E=/400x0/article-new/2025/02/Apple-TV-2025-Thumb-2.jpg?lossy)

## iOS 26 钱包应用护照功能确认

iOS 26 中宣布但未在发布时推出的数字身份功能，即允许美国护照持有者将护照添加到钱包应用的功能，已得到 Apple 确认将在 2025 年晚些时候推出。

*   **发布时间：** Apple 已更新其 iOS 26 功能页面上的措辞，确认该功能将于今年晚些时候推出。
*   **激活方式：** 尽管在 iOS 26.1 的首个 Beta 版本中尚未看到该功能，但许多钱包 ID 功能（如美国各州的驾照，包括即将添加的北达科他州）可以通过 Apple 的服务器端激活，而无需特定的 iOS 更新。

![iOS 26 数字身份护照钱包](https://images.macrumors.com/t/CuE5W7QebYo5UlOpZ8VTaOenlZ4=/400x0/article-new/2025/06/ios-26-digital-id-passport-wallet.jpg?lossy)

## Apple 返校促销活动即将结束

Apple 在美国及其他多个国家/地区为学生提供的年度“返校”促销活动即将结束。

*   **促销内容：** 学生购买符合条件的新款 Mac 或 iPad，即可获得免费 AirPods 或折扣配件（如 Apple Pencil）。
*   **新增选项：** 值得注意的是，新款 AirPods Pro 3 现已作为折扣配件选项加入到此促销活动中。

![AirPods Pro 3 蓝色](https://images.macrumors.com/t/h9ZeEQYIpUZiv-4bNddfINx2gUA=/400x0/article-new/2025/09/airpods-pro-3-blue.jpeg?lossy)

## 其他热门新闻

*   **Apple 正在开发全新操作系统：** Apple 正在开发代号为“Charismatic”的全新操作系统，这很可能是传闻已久的“homeOS”，预计将用于 Apple 2026 年的智能家居中心和 2027 年的桌面机器人。
*   **iPhone 18 Pro 早期传闻：** 尽管 iPhone 18 Pro 和 iPhone 18 Pro Max 还有一年时间，但已有关于这些设备的早期传闻浮出水面。
*   **iPhone 17 Pro Max USB-C 充电速度测试：** ChargerLAB 对 iPhone 17 Pro Max 的 USB-C 充电速度进行了测试，使用 Apple 的多款充电器（18W 至 140W），该设备达到了约 36W 的峰值充电速度。
items.shortSummary: Apple发布iOS 26.1 Beta，新增多语言支持和界面改进。iPhone 17 Pro/Air深色款被发现易刮擦，Apple归因于店内MagSafe充电器磨损。一项实验回顾了iPhone 16 Pro Max 80%充电限制对电池健康的影响。下一代Apple TV有望今年发布，iOS 26钱包应用护照功能确认2025年上线。Apple返校促销活动即将结束，AirPods Pro 3首次纳入。Apple正开发代号“Charismatic”的新操作系统，iPhone 17 Pro Max USB-C充电峰值约36W。

items.content:
iPhone launch month is coming to a close, but there's still plenty to talk about in the Apple world including ongoing discoveries with the new hardware and software.


Apple is also preparing some tweaks and additions in iOS 26.1 and other updates, while we're still expecting some other hardware updates before the end of the year. If you're a student, you should also take note that Apple's annual Back to School promotion in many countries will be wrapping up soon, so read on below for all the details on these stories and more!

Top Stories


Everything New in iOS 26.1 Beta 1


Yep, Apple is already moving forward with the first significant update for iOS 26, as it seeded the first beta of iOS 26.1 and related updates to developers and public beta testers this week.


The update expands Apple Intelligence and AirPods Live Translation to additional languages, brings a new Liquid Design to the dial pad in the Phone app, makes some visual tweaks to Safari, Calendar, and other apps, and more.

Two iPhone 17 Pro and iPhone Air Colors Appear to Scratch More Easily


Some of the new iPhone 17 Pro and iPhone Air models on display at Apple Stores on launch day were already exhibiting scratches and scuffs, particularly on darker finishes like the iPhone 17 Pro and Pro Max in Deep Blue and the iPhone Air in Space Black.


Apple has blamed the blemishes on worn MagSafe chargers being used in stores and claims the marks are removable with cleaning, although it acknowledges certain areas such as the edges of the camera plateaus may pick up small abrasions over time through normal wear and tear.

iPhone 16 Pro Max 80% Charge Limit: One Year Later, Was It Worth It?


For several years, Apple has allowed iPhone users to set a custom charge limit for their devices, capping the charge at 80%, 85%, 90%, or 95% with an eye toward preserving battery health.


We ran a one-year experiment with an iPhone 16 Pro Max, setting its charge limit to 80% and seeing how its battery health compared over time to another device used without any restrictions. Check out the results of our test to see whether it might be a good idea to adjust your charging habits!

Next Apple TV Expected to Launch This Year With These New Features


We're still expecting several hardware updates before the end of the year, and the Apple TV is one of those products on the list.


In the wake of Apple's iPhone and other announcements earlier this month, we've revisited and recapped rumors about what we may see with the next update to Apple's set-top box.

Apple Confirms iOS 26 Wallet Passport Feature is Coming in 2025


One of the announced iOS 26 features that was missing at launch was the Digital ID feature that will bring U.S. passports to the Wallet app on iPhone.


With the launch of iOS 26, Apple said that the feature would be coming in a software update, and the company has now updated the wording on its iOS 26 features page to confirm the feature will be coming later this year.

There's no visible sign of the feature in the first iOS 26.1 beta seeded this week, but many of these Wallet ID features like driver's licenses for various U.S. states (including the imminent addition of North Dakota) can be activated server-side by Apple without necessitating a specific iOS update.

Apple's 'Back to School' Offer Ends Soon, Now Applies to AirPods Pro 3


Apple's annual "Back to School" promotion for students in the U.S. and a number of other countries ends soon, so act fast if you want to score free AirPods with the purchase of an eligible new Mac or iPad.


In addition to everyday discounted pricing for students, the promotion offers free or discounted accessories such as AirPods or Apple Pencils with the purchase of an eligible Mac or iPad. Notably, the new AirPods Pro 3 are now included in the promotion as a discounted accessory option.

MacRumors Newsletter


Each week, we publish an email newsletter like this highlighting the top Apple stories, making it a great way to get a bite-sized recap of the week hitting all of the major topics we've covered and tying together related stories for a big-picture view.

So if you want to have top stories like the above recap delivered to your email inbox each week, subscribe to our newsletter!

items.title: NLRB撤回对蒂姆·库克反泄密邮件违反劳动法的指控 (原标题: NLRB Withdraws Claims That Tim Cook's Anti-Leak Email Violated Labor Laws)
items.creator: Juli Clover
items.summary:
### NLRB撤回对苹果公司蒂姆·库克反泄密邮件的指控

美国国家劳动关系委员会（NLRB）已撤回了针对苹果公司及其首席执行官蒂姆·库克（Tim Cook）的大部分指控。这些指控源于库克在2021年发送给员工的一封电子邮件，该邮件被指控违反了美国劳动法。

#### 事件背景

*   **邮件发送时间**：2021年。
*   **邮件内容**：蒂姆·库克在邮件中警告员工，苹果公司正在努力查明泄露信息的人员，并明确表示此类人员不属于苹果公司。
*   **邮件起因**：这封邮件是在一次苹果公司内部会议内容被泄露之后发出的，该会议讨论了薪酬公平和居家办公等话题。

#### NLRB的最初立场

NLRB最初认为，苹果公司关于泄密的规定“倾向于干涉、限制或胁迫员工”行使他们在《国家劳动关系法》下的权利。

#### 指控的撤回

*   **撤回决定**：NLRB已决定撤回投诉中的大部分指控。
*   **撤回内容**：其中包括指控苹果公司通过施加保密规定和监控员工来违反法律的声明。

![蒂姆·库克数据隐私日](https://images.macrumors.com/t/FjFMxHP75bqzG5M7i0V_FSDiVYA=/400x0/article-new/2021/01/tim-cook-data-privacy-day.jpg?lossy)

这张图片展示了蒂姆·库克在数据隐私日的相关活动，与文章中提到的2021年反泄密邮件事件背景相关。
items.shortSummary: 美国国家劳动关系委员会（NLRB）已撤回了对苹果公司及其首席执行官蒂姆·库克的大部分指控。这些指控源于库克在2021年发送的一封反泄密邮件，该邮件警告员工泄露机密信息将导致被开除。NLRB最初认为苹果的泄密规定干涉了员工权利，但现已撤回了关于苹果违反劳动法、施加保密规定和监控员工的指控。
items.translated_title: NLRB撤回对蒂姆·库克反泄密邮件违反劳动法的指控
items.content:
The National Labor Relations Board (NLRB) is no longer targeting Apple for a 2021 email that Apple CEO Tim Cook sent to employees, reports Bloomberg. The NLRB said that it is withdrawing most of the claims in a complaint that accused Cook of violating U.S. labor law by warning employees about leaking confidential information.


Cook sent the email in 2021, stating that Apple was working to identify people who had leaked information, and that such people do not belong at Apple. Cook's email followed a leaked Apple meeting that included topics like pay equity and working from home.

The NLRB said that Apple's rules around leaks "tend to interfere with, restrain or coerce employees" from the exercise of their rights under the National Labor Relations Act.

Claims that Apple broke the law by imposing confidentiality rules and surveilling workers are being withdrawn.
Tags: NLRB, Tim Cook

items.title: 评测：iPhone 17 Pro 一周使用体验 (原标题: Review: A Week With the iPhone 17 Pro)
items.creator: Juli Clover
items.summary:
## iPhone 17 Pro 一周使用体验评测

本评测是对苹果 iPhone 17 Pro 和 Pro Max 机型发布一周后的长期使用体验总结，由 MacRumors 视频制作人 Dan Barbera 进行。

### 设备状况与耐刮性
*   **外观保持良好：** 尽管此前有报道称 Apple Store 中的 iPhone 17 Pro 样机存在划痕问题，但 Dan 在家中无保护壳使用其银色 iPhone 17 Pro 和宇宙橙色 iPhone 17 Pro Max 一周后，设备仍保持原始状态，未出现划痕。
*   **Ceramic Shield 2 显示屏：** 苹果为 iPhone 17 Pro 机型正面采用了 Ceramic Shield 2，并声称其具有出色的抗刮擦能力。Dan 使用钥匙、硬币等常见口袋物品进行了测试，显示屏上没有出现任何划痕，这与过去 iPhone 容易被钥匙刮伤的情况形成鲜明对比。
*   **店内划痕解释：** 值得注意的是，苹果后来证实，Apple Store 中 iPhone 17 Pro 样机上的痕迹并非划痕，而是由店内 MagSafe 充电支架磨损导致的材料转移。
*   **抗反射涂层：** 显示屏据称具有抗反射涂层，但与 iPhone 16 Pro 相比，差异不明显，并非主要卖点。

### 散热管理
*   **显著改进：** iPhone 17 Pro 机型采用了更新的均热板散热系统和铝制框架，在散热方面取得了重大改进。
*   **不易发热：** 与 iPhone 16 Pro 机型不同，iPhone 17 Pro 机型在使用过程中几乎不发热。

### 电池续航
*   **续航能力提升：** 经过一周的测试，iPhone 17 Pro 和 Pro Max 的电池续航能力都有显著提升。
*   **Pro Max 表现突出：** 尤其是 iPhone 17 Pro Max，其续航时间比 iPhone 16 Pro Max 延长了数小时，但作为代价，它的机身也更重更厚。
*   **充电速度：** ChargerLAB 的测试显示，iPhone 17 Pro Max 使用苹果的 40W 至 140W 充电器时，峰值充电速度约为 36W。

### 摄像头性能
*   **前置摄像头：** 质量大幅提升，自拍效果更好，新增的广角横向自拍功能非常适合合影。
*   **长焦镜头（8倍光学变焦）：** 在光线充足的条件下，8倍变焦照片效果出色。在弱光环境下表现不如预期，但4倍变焦镜头在较差光线条件下仍能保持良好性能。

### 升级建议
*   **值得升级：** 对于仍在犹豫是否从旧款手机升级到 iPhone 17 Pro 机型的用户，评测认为这可能是一次值得的升级。主要原因在于其显著的散热改进、经过验证的抗刮擦能力以及“天壤之别”的电池续航表现。
items.shortSummary: iPhone 17 Pro 和 Pro Max 经过一周使用评测，表现出色。设备在无保护壳使用下未出现划痕，苹果的 Ceramic Shield 2 显示屏抗刮擦能力强。散热系统显著改进，设备不易发热。电池续航大幅提升，尤其是 Pro Max。前置摄像头质量和长焦镜头（8倍光学变焦）在良好光线下表现优异。对于旧款手机用户，因散热、耐刮擦和电池续航的提升，iPhone 17 Pro 值得升级。
items.translated_title: 评测：iPhone 17 Pro 一周使用体验
items.content:
Apple's iPhone 17 models have been out for a week now, so we thought we'd do a longer-term review of the flagship iPhone 17 Pro and Pro Max now that we've been able to spend more time with them.

Subscribe to the MacRumors YouTube channel for more videos.

MacRumors videographer Dan Barbera has a Silver ‌iPhone 17 Pro‌ and a Cosmic Orange ‌iPhone 17 Pro‌ Max, and despite a lot of concern over scratches and the state of ‌iPhone 17 Pro‌ models in Apple Stores, they remain in pristine condition with caseless home use. iPhones may be scratching in stores, but that appears to be less common in daily use at this point.

Apple used Ceramic Shield 2 for the front of the ‌iPhone 17 Pro‌ models, and made some big claims about its scratch resistance. So far, the ‌iPhone 17 Pro‌'s display is holding up. Dan's been testing the display with keys, coins, and other common pocket items, but there isn't a single scratch. With past iPhones, sticking a key in your pocket was a sure way to cause damage.

The display is supposed to have an anti-reflective layer, but it's hard to notice a difference compared to the iPhone 16 Pro. It's definitely a subtle change and not a major selling point.

Dan has already seen major improvements with the updated vapor chamber cooling system and aluminum frame for thermal management. Unlike the ‌iPhone 16‌ Pro models, the ‌iPhone 17 Pro‌ models barely get warm.

There's been time for more substantial battery life testing a week in, and both the 17 Pro and Pro Max have impressive gains. The 17 Pro Max in particular can last for hours longer than the 16 Pro Max, but it's definitely heavier and thicker than before.

The front camera is a major improvement in terms of quality, and selfies look much better than before. The option to take a wider-angle landscape selfie is great for group shots. As for the new Telephoto lens that supports up to 8x optical zoom, as long as you have solid lighting, your 8x shots will look great. Low-light performance isn't as solid, but the 4x lens still performs well in poorer lighting.

If you're still on the fence about upgrading from an older phone to one of the ‌iPhone 17 Pro‌ models, it's potentially worth it. The thermal changes make a huge difference, Apple's claims about scratch resistance seem to be true, and battery life will be night and day. If you already have an ‌iPhone 17 Pro‌, let us know what you think of it in the comments below.
